t: The 8 Best Flameless Candles, According To Our Testing
s: We tested a variety of flameless candles for over 1,000 hours to find the best picks for your home. Plus, two interior designers identify what to look for when shopping.

t: 9 Amazon Valentine’s Day Decor Pieces Under $30
s: This pink flameless candle doubles as a projector to shine hearts on your walls or ceiling. The realistic-looking wax candle runs on batteries or can be plugged in to glow. It comes with a remote control, which allows you to set the candle to stay lit from 2- to 8-hour increments.

t: Flameless Candles Are the MVP of Summertime Hosting — Here Are 6 Great Picks for Your Tablescapes
s: The best flameless candles last longer than authentic ones yet still look realistic on tablescapes. We researched the market and determined our favorites, including remote-controllable pillars, votives, tapers, and flickering styles.

t: The 12 Best Flameless Candles for Your Home
s: The best flameless candles offer a warm glow without the risks and possible mess of a standard wax candle. They can also have long battery life, various settings and features such as color and scent. We researched the best options and reached out to an event planner for extra insight.

t: 12 Flameless Candles That Are Even Better Than the Real Thing
s: Flameless candles are the perfect way to set the mood without the risk of a fire hazard. From pillars and votives to candlesticks and more, these flameless candles look like the real thing.
